t: Amazon.com: Chessex CHX25408 Dice-Opaque Black/White Set : Toys & Games
s: Easy-to-read, good weight, very clear numbering. These dice feel great in the hand -- particularly solid and weighty compared to other manufacturers' dice. Also a great value. I have been happier with Chessex's dice than other brands I have purchased.

t: Amazon (chess) - Wikipedia
s: 1 week ago - The amazon, also known as the queen+knight compound or the dragon, is a fairy chess piece that can move like a queen or a knight. It may thus be considered the sum of all orthodox chess pieces other than the king (because it cannot castle and does not know when it is under threat via the check ...
